content.rendered:
Photo by Barn Images

Hey all, This Week in Genesis there’s new themes,  a great new ‘all themes’ offer, and everyone’s talking about Blox…

Themes

I’m starting this week not with a new theme, but with a great offer from one of my favourite Genesis designer / developers, Ryan Townley.

Not only can you now grab all his themes over at Minimal Genesis for $99 (at the time of writing) but he’s including all his future themes too (and no, I’m not on commission, I just think it’s a great deal).

Save $60 on all themes now and get every future theme released: https://t.co/qEPkApPgQQ

— Minimal Genesis (@minimalgenesis) May 26, 2016

Back to our regular scheduled round-up then, this week sees another third party theme release on StudioPress, with Agent Focused Pro now available to buy (or download for free if you’re a Pro Plus member).

It’s a real estate theme by Winning Agent (and was coded by GenesisWP.guide favourite Marcy Diaz, who you should definitely follow if you don’t already).

Gorgeous new real estate theme 'Agent Focused Pro' by @WinningAgent now on @studiopress https://t.co/RmjdTi2wS8 pic.twitter.com/wxoMqyg1An

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 25, 2016

A first time(?) premium theme release – Kreativ – by Bharath Mandava over at ThemeSquare. Looks like a great first theme.

Just released, 'Kreativ', a new Genesis premium theme from @_mandava https://t.co/MpDNv062PE pic.twitter.com/flRCMzAyeB

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 22, 2016

Wes over at Appfinite has updated his Guru theme with WooCommerce support and a new Portfolio template.

The Guru theme now features WooCommerce Support & a Portfolio Template https://t.co/LNK8ZeJn9q #genesiswp #WordPress pic.twitter.com/HpFFMALxT8

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) May 24, 2016

Showcase

Over in the showcase, there’s another great site from Nicola Tweed (who was recently featured in This Week in Genesis for another great site) for yard41.co.za

Showcase: Yard41 by @nicolatweed — https://t.co/IyTRdnum3y #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/DI2TfEtLKC

— StudioPress (@studiopress) May 25, 2016

Nice site on JT Grauke’s popular Showcase Pro theme by Peter Paul van Ham for kneadhk.com

One of the best looking sites I've seen using my theme, Showcase Pro: https://t.co/PkJqhe8kNP #genesiswp #showcasepro #goteam

— JT Grauke (@jtgrauke) May 26, 2016

Two new foodie sites from design / dev dream team Emily White and Greg Young, sustainabledish.com and empoweredsustenance.com

New custom #genesiswp sites from me & @hbgreg: https://t.co/Gf8Y4ipWdG and https://t.co/rZzZXWJqHB. Custom post types, pages, fields galore!

— Emily White (@emwhitedesigns) May 24, 2016

Resa Barillas for eyeheartcreative.com

Nice site by @resamichelle built on @lindseyriel's Pretty Creative theme https://t.co/BFyS0xL0ji pic.twitter.com/IyHiajkdsk

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 23, 2016

Nick Wilkins for sat7uk.org

We’re very pleased to have launched a new site for the lovely folks at @SAT7UK https://t.co/yOyOpDjZfW #wordpress #genesiswp

— Nick Wilmot (@nickwilmot) May 23, 2016

Claire Lobel for smashsocial.co.uk

New website launched today for a social media management company https://t.co/yzKwRkqx7V #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/DKn5NbgZ0B

— Claire Lobel (@clairelobel) May 26, 2016

Binary Turf for zamzam.io

Another #WordPress #GenesisWP project we recently finished up with: https://t.co/bSL90MjHpb
Do read what the client has to say.

— Binary Turf (@binaryturf) May 21, 2016

Best of the rest

Anita releases a new plugin – Signature Widget for Genesis – on the WordPress plugin repository.

Congratulations to @TheCre8tiveDiva on her first #GenesisWP plugin being added to #WordPress repository: https://t.co/WpE48e3Cng @GaryJ

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) May 26, 2016

And Ren is working on another plugin called Author Box Reloaded.

Working on a new #GenesisWP plugin that should be available very soon. It's called Genesis Author Box Reloaded. pic.twitter.com/OMAcxQPTMA

— Ren V. (@CLE_Ren) May 22, 2016

Sridhar with a nice breakdown of what’s changed in the recent Genesis Sample theme 2.2.3 update.

What's changed in Genesis Sample 2.2.3:https://t.co/P1lUhCtltW#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/lZ2sylkEWt

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 21, 2016

…and Ron updates his Sass version of the Genesis Sample Theme to 2.2.3

Updated #Genesass to 2.2.3 https://t.co/65SeXzycMH #genesiswp #WordPress

— RON (@RonWillemse) May 22, 2016

Plus, Srikat continues to rock out the tutorials at a prodigious rate, with several free, new additions to his large collection of tutorials, including:

Multiple Loops in #GenesisWP: https://t.co/lnMEVyZ0Ul

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 27, 2016

How to remove Posts page heading in Genesis: https://t.co/9AT1rXpNTV#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 26, 2016

And, finally…

The new Blox plugin continues to get a lot of love. What do you think? Have you tried it yet?

Experimenting with the @BloxWP plugin for #genesiswp – Nice!

— Bradley Potter (@bradleypotter) May 22, 2016

The Blox #genesiswp WordPress plugin looks very good. Here's a video walkthrough for adding post banner images https://t.co/rKGl4XCRAD

— Clive Walker (@clivewalker) May 26, 2016

Blox Lite has climbed past 500 active users. If you haven't already, check it out, it's free! – https://t.co/xnbfmZqhhI #genesiswp

— Blox (@bloxwp) May 25, 2016

That’s all for this week. The eagle eyed among you might have noticed I’m slightly late (again) this week so if I missed your awesome thing please accept my apologies

But do throw it up on the homepage and I’ll consider it for next week’s round-up.

Cheers and have a great weekend!

PS If you’re new to This Week in Genesis I’d love it if you subscribe in the that box below, I send one (very occasionally, two) emails a week and whenever I get a new subscriber it makes my day.

excerpt.rendered: New themes, a great new ‘all themes’ offer, and everyone’s talking about Blox…
